metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42756 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Netfilter subsystem of the Linux kernel. A racecondition between IPSET_CMD_ADD and IPSET_CMD_SWAP can lead to a kernelpanic due to the invocation of `__ip_set_put` on a wrong `set`. This issuemay allow a local user to crash the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
